name: Swimmin' In Circles
description:
WELCOME TO TAROMILK'S FIRST-EVER GAME!

PRESS [SPACEBAR] TO SWITCH THE DIRECTION OF THE FISH SWIMMING.

PRESS [ESC] TO PAUSE.

CREDITS:

BACKGROUND MUSIC: 'GROOVE MUSIC' BY BENJAMIN MASTRIPOLITO

SFX; WWW.FREESOUND.ORG

(THIS IS NOT A FINAL REPRESENTATION OF THE GAME)

REPORT A BUG
